Based on the provided paper, I'll extract the structured information following the guidelines:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "SADA-Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project (MVP)",
    "country": "Ghana",
    "region": "Northern Ghana",
    "target_population": "Rural households in selected villages"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": false,
      "cash_support_type": null,
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "No explicit mention of cash transfers, stipends, or consumption support found in paper"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["agricultural inputs", "fertilizer"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "The project increased participation in agriculture (membership of farmer groups, agricultural training, access to loans, fertiliser use)"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "poverty",
      "education",
      "gender equality",
      "child mortality",
      "maternal health",
      "disease prevention",
      "environmental sustainability",
      "food security",
      "employment",
      "health services access"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "MVP had the goal of breaking the poverty trap by achieving the MDGs... Each goal had targets (18 in total) to be met by 2015, and a total of 48 measurable indicators",
    "study_design": "Difference-in-differences with matched villages and households",
    "design_evidence_citation": "To evaluate MVP we employed a difference-in-difference (DiD) design using matched project and control villages, and matched project and control households",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2015-2017",
    "sample_size": 2251,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": true,
    "cost_mentions": "Estimated cost of $300 million across 15 localities",
    "cost_evidence_citation": "We estimated the cost of the project in 15 localities to be at least $300 million"
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "The SADA-Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project (MVP) was one of 15 Millennium Village projects implemented in Sub-Saharan Africa since 2006",
    "country_citation": "This article assesses the impact of the Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project",
    "target_population_citation": "The project was designed following the recommendations of the United Nations Millennium Project to show that the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) could be achieved in rural Africa at a small geographic scale"
  }
}
```
